import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import _ from "lodash"; const Table = () => { useEffect(() => { getAllData(); }, []); //menampilkan semua data const [datas, getData] = useState([]); const [paginatedPost, setpaginatedPost] = useState(); const getAllData = () => { axios .get("/api/data") .then((response) => { const allData = response.data.data_barang; getData(allData); setpaginatedPost(_(getData).slice(0).take(pageSize).value()) }) .catch((error) => console.log(`error: ${error}`)); }; //melakukan action pada item search const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); // const [row, setRow] = useState(""); const pageSize = 5; const pageCount = datas ? Math.ceil(datas.length / pageSize) : 0; if (pageCount === 1) return null; const pages = _.range(1, pageCount + 1); return (
